How many people are affected by Ghosal hematodiaphyseal dysplasia ?,Ghosal hematodiaphyseal dysplasia is a rare disorder; only a few cases have been reported in the medical literature. Most affected individuals have been from the Middle East and India.,GHR,Ghosal hematodiaphyseal dysplasia
